Title: Allows off-track betting corporations to set up special reserve funds
Summary: Allows off-track betting corporations to set up special reserve funds to use as an alternative to current capital acquisition funds.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to allowing off-track betting corporations to set up special reserve funds
